app_descript:
App Name: Dancing Road

Brief:

Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of music and color with Dancing Road, a captivating game that challenges you to roll the ball in sync with the beat. Navigate through various levels, each with its own unique background music and increasing difficulty, to test your rhythm and coordination. Ideal for music game enthusiasts of all stripes, Dancing Road promises a harmonious blend of entertainment and challenge.
